Title: Increases the enhanced STAR property tax deduction for tax for final assessment rolls to be completed after two thousand twenty-four and eliminates school taxes for certain persons eighty and older
Summary: Increases the enhanced STAR property tax deduction for tax for final assessment rolls to be completed after two thousand twenty-four; provides a total exemption from school taxes for certain persons eighty years of age and older.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to increasing the enhanced STAR property tax deduction and to providing a total exemption for school taxes for certain persons eighty years of age and older
